channel.title: Good Reads on Coding notes - and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Good Reads on Coding notes - and snippets

item.title: Technical Reading List - Essential Developer Resources
item.description: Containers and Unix The container is a lie - Deep dive into how containers actually work at the OS level. ASP.NET Core Hosting on IIS with ASP.NET Core 2.2 - InProcess vs OutOfProcess hosting models. .NET Core compilation and packages - Understanding .NET Core primitives. Microservices How to cut microservices - Practical approach to service boundaries. Monolith to microservices summary - Migration strategies and patterns. Java and Scala Download and install JDK 11 on Windows - Java, JRE, and JDK setup guide.
